channel.title: I have a huge but simple problem
channel.description:
i have made a server and client but i need to know how to make the server ip on the client hidden so when people use the client they can only log on too my server using my client
please help

item.title: I have a huge but simple problem
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

look for setserver in client.java in the client files and set both occurrences to your address and port

Read full topic
item.source: I have a huge but simple problem

You mean you want it so people only with your client can connect? If so make a uid
